project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of a line of credit of US$10.0 million, which would be on-lent by the Bank of Mauritius (BOM) to two participating financial institutions.  These institutions would relend the funds for investment projects in manufacturing, transport, tourism and industrial building construction.  The project will create employment opportunities and increase foreign exchange earnings as well as increase competition among financial institutions in providing term finance.

P001910.docty: Project Completion Report,Guarantee Agreement,Loan Agreement,Staff Appraisal Report
